description: NetworkPolicyPort describes a port to allow traffic on

endPort.description: If set, indicates that the range of ports from port to endPort, inclusive, should be allowed by the policy. This field cannot be defined if the port field is not defined or if the port field is defined as a named (string) port. The endPort must be equal or greater than port. This feature is in Beta state and is enabled by default. It can be disabled using the Feature Gate "NetworkPolicyEndPort".

protocol.description: The protocol (TCP, UDP, or SCTP) which traffic must match. If not specified, this field defaults to TCP.
